name: Easy Magazine
author: Filtr8

sections.description:
Easy Magazine app combines content discovery, curation and marketing capabilities in your personal Newsroom, which is always up to date with the relevant high-quality news and articles, carefully curated by our search engine from the best online sources according to your specific criteria.

From your Newsroom you can publish discovered content into your magazine just in one click, or make them post automatically. You can get subscribers and leads, add to your magazine calls to actions, and do more cool stuff with advanced marketing tools.

Providing the relevant high-qualiy content to your audience is a great way to increase your time-on-site, reduce bounce rate, and improve your search rank. Try it for FREE now!

This plugin allows to embed magazines created with Filtr8 app into your WordPress website.
sections.installation:
1. Sign up for Filtr8, create your Newsroom feed and publish some items
  2. Install and activate Filtr8 Magazine plugin on your WordPress Plugins page
  3. Grab the shortcut code for your magazine from your Filtr8 Newsroom (see Screenshots for illustration)
  4. Add shortcode to your page (see Screenshots for illustration)
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • Initial release

2.0.13

  • Rebranding & bug fixing

2.1.13

  • Support latest WP version & bug fixing

  3. Grab the shortcut code for your magazine from your Filtr8 Newsroom (see Screenshots for illustration)
  4. Add shortcode to your page (see Screenshots for illustration)
